product_name: CycleOps PowerBeam Pro ANT+ Bike Trainer
long_description: Designed for the most demanding riders, the CycleOps PowerBeam Pro ANT+ Bike Trainer offers a real road feel and precise control of training variables to maximize training efficiency.
short_description: Designed for the most demanding riders, the CycleOps PowerBeam Pro ANT+ Bike Trainer offers a real road feel and precise control of training variables to maximize training efficiency.
